prompt: Create an image upload page with a futuristic dark theme and a centered layout. The upload zone should have a glowing cyan border (#00BCD4) and a dark background (#121212). Include a futuristic upload icon, text 'Upload Images Now', and supported formats (PNG, JPG, max 8MB). Use cyan accent color (#00BCD4) for buttons and icons. Place a glowing 'Upload Now' button below the zone. Show selected files in a grid with names, sizes, and remove buttons. Use a dark background (#121212) with neon typography and Material Design spacing.
